title: New Marburg Virus Outbreak Confirmed In Equatorial Guinea
description: Equatorial Guinea has just confirmed its first outbreak of deadly Marburg virus, a hemorrhagic fever related to Ebola.

description: Netflix is removing Arrested Development from its streaming catalog, possibly for good.

title: Zoox Drives Public Roads, And Yes, Robotaxis Should Drive Backwards Sometimes
description: Zoox's vehicle is out on public roads.  It is symmetrical, it goes forwards or backwards just the same, and other robocars should consider also driving in reverse when they need to.

title: Kia’s Super Bowl Binky Dad Spot Beats GM, Stellantis For Sparking Web Traffic
description: If clicks tell the story, reaction to the four auto commercials airing during the Super Bowl ranged from meh to yeah with a devoted dad's wild ride to fetch his baby's binky sparking the most action on auto buying and research site Cars.com.

title: For Valentine’s Day, 5 Survey Findings About Singles From Pew Research
description: A Pew Research Center survey found 30% of U.S. adults to be single and of these 57% were "not currently looking for a relationship or casual dates.”

title: Don’t Let A Scammer Steal Your Happily-Ever-After This Valentine’s Day
description: Romance scams are thriving online. Companies and agencies who monitor these kinds of scams expect numbers to tick up around Valentine's Day, since those looking to make a connection can also appear to be easy marks.

description: GBS centers were originally structured around economies of scale through consolidation and process improvement. But digital transformation is causing GBS centers to re-envision their role in larger enterprises because of the dynamic relationship between operations and technology

title: Tepid European Auto Recovery Will Ignite Competition While Electric Car Growth Slows
description: Cut-throat competition will return to Europe’s car market this year as sales turn positive, while electric sales will pause for breath. New Chinese mainly electric sales will add an extra level of difficulty. Reverberations from the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act are undermining European confidence.

title: Ouster-Velodyne Merger Further Consolidates Lidar Industry

title: Here’s How a Simple AI Mistake Can Drop Your Capital Value By $100B Less Than 24hrs

title: To Get Rid Of Excess Inventory, Retailers Turn To ‘Endless Aisle’
